title: Republicans Race Toward Nuclear War
itunes:title: Republicans Race Toward Nuclear War
description:
With the Russian Ukrainian conflict escalating toward a possible nuclear conflict, Charlie offers a fiery proclamation to any Republicans not completely bought off by the military industrial complex as they aide and abet the war mongering leftwing regime that is hurtling America closer and closer to an all-out nuclear war with Russia. Why are they still supporting billions of dollars being sent to Ukraine? Why is the media so addicted to banging the drums of war? Why would Republicans do this so close to midterms? Is this an intentional election sabotage by playing God in the Donbas? Charlie holds nothing back in this intense but critically important episode of The Charlie Kirk Show.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
